title: Sorry for the prolonged absence
body: Hey guys. Just dropping in to let you know that: 1) I'm not dead. 2) Work is going full-steam ahead at the new place. 3) The Cinebar is 50% installed. 4) The auditorium stages are built. 5) Yes, we're really showing RELIGULOUS. 6) Here are some pictures for you to look at (the last 10 or so). Now I have to go to sleep. Meeting flooring people at 8:30 tomorrow morning. Yuck!
author: Dan
